name: Remove Wikipedia fundraising banner
description:
Hides the Wikipedia fundraising campaign on all Wikipedia subdomains. The fundraising campaign text summarized:
"If everyone reading this gave $5/â‚¬3, our fundraiser would be done within an hour. Please help us forget fundraising and get back to Wikipedia. Thank you."

Hide wikipedia fundraiser banner
additional_info:
Version 1.1 (October 5, 2017)

This version was tested on Chrome and Firefox, but should work too in other browsers who support user styles. I grant you the permission do to whatever you like with this code.

See also https://userstyles.org/styles/83071/remove-wikipedia-central-notice-site-notice
